title: How It Works
subtitle: Simple steps to get your packages delivered quickly and reliably

features.title: Booking Pick & Drop
features.description: Schedule a pickup at your convenience and we'll collect your package from your doorstep. Our reliable drivers ensure safe handling and timely drop-off at the destination.

features.title: Cash On Delivery
features.description: We offer secure COD services where recipients can pay upon delivery. Our transparent process ensures you receive payments promptly after successful deliveries.

features.title: Delivery Hub
features.description: Our network of strategically located hubs enables efficient sorting and distribution. Packages are processed quickly for fastest possible delivery times.

features.title: Booking SME & Corporate
features.description: Dedicated solutions for businesses with bulk shipping needs. Enjoy customized logistics, volume discounts, and dedicated account management.

footerText: From personal packages to business shipments — we deliver on time, every time with our reliable logistics network.
